column6: The Gauntlet continues to close around Spider-Man in this heartbreaking story of love, loss and lust for power as the Rhino charges into Spider-Man's life, out to make a name for himself...by killing the Rhino?
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Fabio D'Auria | inker:Max Fiumara | writer:Joe Kelly | penciller (cover):Paolo Rivera | editor:Stephen Wacker
